title: Leftover gammon salad
ingredients: ['2 handfuls salad leaves', '1/4 cucumber, sliced', '1 handful olives', '100g cherry tomatoes', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1/2 pepper, seeded and sliced', '1 carrot, peeled into ribbons', '80g feta cheese, crumbled', '100g to 200g leftover honey glazed gammon, shredded', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 teaspoon wholegrain mustard', '1 glug olive oil', '1 glug balsamic vinegar']
